content: we still don't have a way of using milestones for cargo changes
if rustbot could traverse subtree merges and tag their pull requests with milestones, it would be amazing :)
Getting the information for Cargo in particular may be relatively easier, given @Eric Huss's excellent listings for submodule bumps in relatively standard form, though.
I can maybe be persuaded to automate setting the milestones when I do the cargo release notes. I already use a script which needs to figure out which release each PR is in.

Well, the simplest thing would be to add a few lines of code to triagebot presuming the output of the tool is standard to set milestones on the upstream PRs, which seems likely to be fairly straightforward. Though I suppose your tool could also try to set milestones when creating the PR...
